thread.title: Kourtney K flaunts `slimmed-down bod` on Instagram
thread.title_full: Kourtney K flaunts `slimmed-down bod` on Instagram

title: Kourtney K flaunts `slimmed-down bod` on Instagram
text: Kourtney K flaunts `slimmed-down bod` on Instagram Monday, 19 October 2015 (6 minutes ago) *Washington D.C., Oct.19 (ANI): Kourtney Kardashian has recently shared two pictures of her on the social media, one exhibiting her slimmed-down body and other showing her snuggle with her kids .* Washington D.C., Oct.19 (ANI): Kourtney Kardashian has recently shared two pictures of her on the social media, one exhibiting her slimmed-down body and other showing her snuggle with her kids . The 36-year-old TV personality took to her Instagram account to share the snap, which shows her snuggling with her kids in matching Halloween pajamas, captioning it, "Skeleton cuddles," Us magazine reports. Later, the the 'Keeping Up with the Kardashians ' star shared another pic, in which she flaunted her slimmed-down body in a sexy black tank top while posing for the mirror. Kardashian captioned the pic, "Working out is one of the only things that helps when I'm feeling anxious."(ANI)
